urn:li:fs_normalized_company:39939.description:
Lynda.com, a LinkedIn Company, is a leading online learning company that helps anyone learn business, technology and creative skills to achieve personal and professional goals. Through individual, government, corporate and academic subscriptions, members have access to the lynda.com video library of engaging, top-quality courses taught by recognized industry experts – more than 5,700 courses and 255,000 video tutorials across mobile and desktop. 

LinkedIn was founded in 2003 and is helping over 364 million members worldwide achieve more in their careers by making connections, discovering opportunities and gaining insights. LinkedIn’s global reach means we get to make a direct impact on the world’s workforce in ways no other company can. Together, we can transform lives through innovative learning products and technology.

At Lynda.com & LinkedIn, we strive to help our employees find passion and purpose. Join us in changing the way the world works!
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:39939.name: Lynda.com

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:9202023.description:
LinkedIn创建于 2003 年，总部位于美国加州硅谷，办公室遍及全球30多个城市。领英致力于连接全球职场人士，并协助他们事半功倍，发挥所长。作为全球领先的职场社交平台，LinkedIn用户数已超过6.1亿，覆盖全球200多个国家和地区，每个《财富》世界 500 强公司均有高管加入。LinkedIn拥有多元化经营模式，主要收入来自于所提供的征才解决方案、营销解决方案、销售解决方案及高级订阅帐户。LinkedIn的愿景是为全球30亿劳动力中的每一位创造经济机会，进而绘制世界首个经济图谱。
 
为了更好地连接中国职场人士，为其提供全球化平台，助力他们实现职业理想，2014年1月，领英宣布正式进入中国，并启用中文名称 – “领英”。领英在中国努力为中国用户提供更好的本地化产品和服务，并通过领英大数据和全球化平台帮助中国政府和企业与全球人才和商业机会相连，助力中国经济发展。自领英进入中国以来，中国用户数增长超过10倍，已逾4,500万；同时，有超过1,000家企业和政府客户携手领英招募优质人才，打造商业和雇主品牌。
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:9202023.name: LinkedIn China 领英中国

name: LinkedIn
description: Founded in 2003, LinkedIn connects the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful. With more than 830 million members worldwide, including executives from every Fortune 500 company, LinkedIn is the world's largest professional network. The company has a diversified business model with revenue coming from Talent Solutions, Marketing Solutions, Sales Solutions and Premium Subscriptions products. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, LinkedIn has offices across the globe.

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:15083827.description: We are an online learning platform with over 16,000 courses taught by real-world experts and a library that is constantly up to date. Our community of learners engage in courses across business, creative, technology and more, helping them get closer to achieving their professional goals. Learn the relevant skills you need to build the experiences that will help you reach your definition of success.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:15083827.name: LinkedIn Learning

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:4973897.description: Creating opportunities for the world’s buyers and sellers to build productive relationships through social media.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:4973897.name: LinkedIn Sales Solutions

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:80744552.description: Our unique culture, incredible team and mission-driven work set us apart. Follow along to see what it’s like to join the #linkedinlife
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:80744552.name: LinkedIn Life

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:4973896.description: Build your presence, establish relationships with professionals globally, and reach the people that matter most on LinkedIn.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:4973896.name: LinkedIn Marketing Solutions

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3632240.description:
The Economic Graph is a digital representation of the global economy based on over 774 million members, 36,000 skills, 50 million companies, 11 million open jobs, and 90,000 schools. In short: it’s all the data on LinkedIn.

Through mapping every member, company, job, and school, we’re able to spot trends like talent migration, hiring rates, and in-demand skills by region. These insights help us connect people to economic opportunity in new ways.  And by partnering with governments and organizations around the world, we help them better connect people to opportunities.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:3632240.name: LinkedIn's Economic Graph

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:14041259.description:
Follow fresh perspectives from the companies, people, and topics you care about: https://lnkd.in/gb9yHzZ 

On LinkedIn, your network can help connect you with new people and opportunities. 

Here you'll find resources and tips for how to easily tap into the power of your relationships and communities as you advance your career.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:14041259.name: LinkedIn Guide to Networking

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:42343296.description:
When a community comes together, opportunity is created. Many of us are adjusting to changes in how we work and live. We’re here to help connect you to the right information and resources, and highlight ways you can give and get help. We want to hear from you. Share what’s working. Ask questions. We’re in it together.

Note: This Page is moderated by LinkedIn and adheres to the same professional community guidelines and policies that apply to LinkedIn.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:42343296.name: LinkedIn COVID-19 Community Resources

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:70260066.description:
Our dream is to unlock the full potential of the nonprofit sector to accelerate social impact on a global scale.

It all starts with one core belief. The bedrock of every successful organization is the people supporting it — their talent, donors, constituents, and program participants. These people form powerful networks; and it’s essential for organizations to find ways to tap into those networks.

So, as the world’s largest professional network, how do our tools help nonprofit organizations like yours tap into the power of our network?

With LinkedIn for Nonprofits, you can find, hire, and develop the best talent — from full-time staff to volunteers to board members. Plan smarter with data and insights on the labor market and talent flows, and build your organization’s brand and fundraising efforts. Ultimately, our tools help you make more of the connections you need at scale so that you can achieve your goals.

We offer up to a 50% discount on core products in Talent, Learning, and Fundraising. Nonprofits can also benefit from paid advertising on LinkedIn, though these solutions are not discounted. We also offer dedicated support with LinkedIn nonprofit consultants and free online resources to help nonprofits large and small be successful on and off LinkedIn.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:70260066.name: LinkedIn for Nonprofits

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:72771296.description:
We are the Women In Tech (WIT) community at LinkedIn, an employee-led effort to promote gender balance in technical roles at LinkedIn and inspire other companies to do the same. 

Our goal is to foster an inviting environment where you can build your network, learn to own your career development, and pay it forward to elevate other women. This is a place where we will share personal learnings and insights, upcoming events, and relevant updates to help foster your career growth. Join us in our journey to #empowerHer and create change together.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:72771296.name: LinkedIn WIT

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:10091994.description: The mission of LinkedIn's Social Impact team is to connect job seekers facing barriers with the resources and networks to build meaningful careers.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:10091994.name: LinkedIn Social Impact

urn:li:fs_normalized_company:80010593.description:
LinkedIn Engineering builds and manages the complex technology infrastructure and products that help connect the world’s professionals to economic opportunity. 

Our engineers comprise a collaborative, mission-driven community dedicated to building quality and ethical products that solve the toughest technical challenges facing job seekers, learners, and 57M+ small and large businesses today.  

We do work that matters and feeds our curiosity. Join our community and learn more about the meaningful impact we make on more than 800M members around the world.
urn:li:fs_normalized_company:80010593.name: LinkedIn Engineering
